title: Region defined by y=1/SQRTx  part - c

content.question: Find the volume of the solid whose base is the region R and whose cross sections cut by planes perpendicular to the x-axis are squares.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid whose base is the region R and whose cross sections cut by planes perpendicular to the x-axis are squares.

topic.text: 8.7: Volumes with Cross Sections - Squares and Rectangles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
